# API Reference: supersonic.data.*

The `supersonic.data` namespace includes APIs that work with Supersonic Data. They provide efficient ways for manipulating data in the cloud â€“ creating, updating and deleting records. Read more in the [Data Guides](/supersonic/guides/data/).

<p class="advanced-panel">
<strong>Note:</strong> when using AngularJS, methods in the <code>supersonic.data.*</code> namespace currently require a manual <code>$scope.$apply</code> in their callbacks/promises.
</p>
